import React from 'react' import { Card, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' const SingleItem = ({item, openItem}) => { return (

{item.name}

 {item.discount === true ? (

{item.price}€

{item.discountPrice}€

Save {item.price - item.discountPrice} € !
) :

{item.price}€

} ) } export default SingleItem
